about_the_game: Embark on a delightful adventure of discovery as you seek out the Missing Critters hidden throughout beautifully intricate cartoon scenes. Let the soothing lo-fi soundtrack transport you to a place of calm focus as you explore each level at your own pace, with no time limits or constraints. Enjoy the thrill of the hunt and the satisfaction of finding all the Critters, all while unwinding and taking a break from the stresses of the day. Get ready for a unique and captivating experience that will keep you coming back for more.
detailed_description: Embark on a delightful adventure of discovery as you seek out the Missing Critters hidden throughout beautifully intricate cartoon scenes. Let the soothing lo-fi soundtrack transport you to a place of calm focus as you explore each level at your own pace, with no time limits or constraints. Enjoy the thrill of the hunt and the satisfaction of finding all the Critters, all while unwinding and taking a break from the stresses of the day. Get ready for a unique and captivating experience that will keep you coming back for more.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any Distro supporting X Window System (X11)
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU with 64-bit architecture (such as Intel Pentium or AMD Athlon 64)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectSound compatible
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Any Distro supporting X Window System (X11)
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU with 64-bit architecture (such as Intel Pentium or AMD Athlon 64)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectSound compatible

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13+
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU with 64-bit architecture
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 2.1
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.13+
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU with 64-bit architecture
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 80 MB available space

name: Missing Critters

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU with 64-bit architecture (such as Intel Pentium or AMD Athlon 64)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.1-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectSound compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-bit)
  • Processor: Dual-core CPU with 64-bit architecture (such as Intel Pentium or AMD Athlon 64)
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 3-compatible GPU
  • Storage: 80 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any DirectSound compatible

short_description: Embark on a delightful adventure and seek out the Missing Critters hidden within intricate cartoon scenes, with a soothing lo-fi soundtrack and no time limits - just relax and unwind. Enjoy a captivating experience that will provide fresh challenges, as each play-through is unique.
supported_languages: English, French, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
